info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.usage.subscription

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

subscriptionListSubscriptionsRsp.description: Response to call to get list of tenant subscriptions
subscriptionListSubscriptionsRsp.title: List subscription response

subscriptionPeriod.description: Response to call to get list of tenant subscriptions
subscriptionPeriod.title: List subscription response

end_date.description:
Kast day of the last billing_period in external provider

Example: ` "2020-05-20T12:32:51.341959216Z"`
end_date.title: End date

internal_end_date.description:
internal end date that serves as source of truth

Example: ` "2020-05-20T12:32:51.341959216Z"`
internal_end_date.title: Internal end date

internal_start_date.description:
internal start date that serves as source of truth

Example: ` "2020-05-20T12:32:51.341959216Z"`
internal_start_date.title: Internal start date

invoices.description: Link to all of the invoices for this period
invoices.title: Invoices

start_date.description:
The first day of the last billing_period in external provider

Example: ` "2020-05-20T12:32:51.341959216Z"`
start_date.title: Start date

trial.description: Flag shows if this billing time frame is part of trial period
trial.title: Trial

uid.description:
Unique identifier of this time frame

Example: ` "a536793b-2852-455c-9df8-ef237e811825"`
uid.title: UUID

subscriptionSubscriptionType.description: Tenant subscription to the services record
subscriptionSubscriptionType.title: Subscription record

cancellation_date.description:
date when subscription become cancelled

Example: ` "2020-04-20T12:32:51.341959216Z"`
cancellation_date.title: Cancellation date

cancelled.description: flag shows if this subscription is already cancelled
cancelled.title: Cancelled

current.description: Flag shows if this subscription is currently active
current.title: Current

last_billing_period_end_date.description:
The last day of the last billing_period

Example: ` "2020-05-20T12:32:51.341959216Z"`
last_billing_period_end_date.title: Billing period end date

last_billing_period_start_date.description:
The first day of the last billing_period

Example: ` "2020-04-20T12:32:51.341959216Z"`
last_billing_period_start_date.title: Billing period start date

name.description:
Name of the subscription (internal name, not human readable), a subscription has no human readable name

Example: ` "sub-name-2e170678-4f50-4336-8af9-5413e9bdf250"`
name.title: Name

previous_billing_periods.description: List of the previous billing periods
previous_billing_periods.title: Previous billing periods

start_date.description:
Date when subscription become active

Example: ` "2020-04-20T12:32:51.341959216Z"`
start_date.title: Start date
